name: Research Metrics Engine
description: Core system for calculating and processing research-related metrics including author contributions, impact scores, and interdisciplinary research measurements. Handles the fundamental analytics computations that power research evaluation features.

name: Dashboard Performance
description: Optimization and maintenance of analytics dashboards focusing on memory usage, loading times, and overall performance. Ensures smooth user experience when accessing funding analysis and peer review analytics interfaces.

name: Data Visualization
description: Components handling the visual representation of analytics data, including geographic distributions and citation network graphs. Focuses on rendering performance and proper display of complex data relationships.

name: Processing Pipeline
description: Infrastructure for handling real-time and batch analytics processing workflows. Manages job queues, processing latency, and system performance during peak usage periods.

name: Predictive Analytics
description: Systems for analyzing trends and generating research predictions based on historical data. Includes model accuracy monitoring and trend analysis algorithms for forecasting research developments.

name: Citation Management
description: Handles all citation-related functionality including preview modals, reference formatting, and bibliography processing. Focuses on ensuring accurate and performant handling of academic citations and reference styles across the application.

name: Document Editor Core
description: Core text editing and formatting capabilities including markdown processing and LaTeX equation rendering. Ensures consistent document formatting and maintains text integrity across different content types and paste operations.

name: Collaboration Features
description: Real-time collaboration functionality including multi-user synchronization and shared annotation features. Manages state consistency across multiple users and browser instances for concurrent editing scenarios.

name: Media Processing
description: Handles processing and generation of media assets including PDF thumbnails and visualization renders. Focuses on optimizing performance for large file operations and complex visual data representations.

name: Interface Accessibility
description: Ensures application-wide accessibility standards including keyboard navigation and modal interactions. Handles user interface components and interactions with focus on accessibility compliance and usability for all users.

name: Concurrency Management
description: Handles race conditions, deadlocks and thread safety issues in concurrent API operations. Focuses on maintaining data consistency and preventing conflicts during high-load parallel processing scenarios.

name: Document Processing
description: Manages PDF processing, metadata extraction, and citation handling workflows. Handles multi-language support, DOI processing, and ensures reliable document transformation and data extraction.

name: Cache and Storage
description: Handles caching mechanisms, data versioning, and storage optimization. Ensures proper cache invalidation and maintains consistency between cached data and primary storage systems.

name: Real-time Communication
description: Manages WebSocket connections, GraphQL subscriptions, and real-time data synchronization. Focuses on maintaining stable connections and efficient data streaming for collaborative features.

name: Search and Discovery
description: Handles search functionality, query processing, and result ranking. Ensures accurate field weighting, proper indexing, and optimized search performance across different content types.

name: Training Pipeline Performance
description: Handles issues related to model training efficiency, memory usage, and pipeline stability. Focuses on optimizing GPU resource utilization and resolving training bottlenecks across different model architectures.

name: Model Validation Framework
description: Manages cross-validation processes and quality assurance for machine learning models. Addresses classification accuracy, bias detection, and evaluation methodology across different data types and domains.

name: Data Processing Engine
description: Covers batch processing operations and feature engineering workflows. Handles data synchronization, cache management, and resolves processing deadlocks in the ML pipeline.

name: Content Analysis System
description: Manages content processing tasks including duplicate detection and text summarization. Focuses on improving accuracy of content-based features and reducing false positive rates in content matching.

name: Citation Processing Tools
description: Handles citation network analysis and reference string parsing capabilities. Addresses citation format standardization and improves processing of academic reference data across different citation styles.

name: Storage Optimization
description: Focuses on managing storage costs, data compression, and efficient data retention policies. Includes issues related to cold storage optimization, database storage management, and metrics retention configuration.

name: Container Platform Management
description: Handles container orchestration, scaling, and cluster health monitoring. Addresses Kubernetes node scaling, MongoDB containerization, and resource allocation challenges across the container ecosystem.

name: Network Infrastructure
description: Covers network connectivity, routing, and cross-zone communication optimization. Includes service mesh configuration, NAT gateway management, and API connectivity issues between partner institutions.

name: Cache Performance
description: Manages caching systems and database load optimization. Focuses on Redis cache configuration, eviction policies, and strategies to maintain optimal cache-to-database load balance.

name: Deployment Pipeline
description: Addresses infrastructure deployment processes and automation tools. Handles Terraform state management, parallel deployment capabilities, and infrastructure as code optimization.

name: Accessibility Standards
description: Addresses WCAG compliance issues and screen reader compatibility across the application. Focuses on color contrast, aria labels, keyboard navigation and ensuring the interface is usable by people with disabilities.

name: Touch Interface Controls
description: Handles all touch-based interactions and gesture controls on mobile and tablet devices. Includes drag-and-drop functionality, multi-select gestures, and touch-responsive layouts.

name: Layout Responsiveness
description: Manages responsive design implementations and layout stability across different screen sizes and devices. Focuses on preventing layout shifts, optimizing component arrangements, and maintaining consistent spacing.

name: Document Preview System
description: Handles all preview-related features including citation formatting, bibliography styles, and PDF interactions. Covers LaTeX rendering, real-time updates, and document sidebar functionality.

name: Interactive State Management
description: Manages application state handling for interactive elements like modals, focus states, and user selections. Ensures proper state transitions and maintains interface consistency during user interactions.
